name: Jeniffer Lawrence
title: Students
text: A few my coursemates live here as well. There are a lot of foreigner students in the building.

name: Rick Grimes
title: Management
text: Renting issues are solved efficiently, communication is superb. Thank you!

name: Nils Dahlberg
title: Apartment
text: Not large, but very cool apartment for student. All needed furniture, equipment and fast internet is here!

name: Zhang Xiu Ying
title: Price
text: The quality/price ratio for apartment in this location is probably unbeatable here in Kaunas.

name: Amanda Nilsson
title: Perfect location
